case.title: Tap on calendar field > Verify calendar appears and functions

custom.preconds: Open hotel search form

step.content: I tap on the calendar field
step.expected: Calendar animates up from the bottom

step.content: I tap on the chevron in the calendar header
step.expected: Chevrons advances/reverses months displayed

step.content: I tap on a date on the calendar
step.expected: It highlights that date and shows a callout including the date and helpful text

step.content: I tap on a second date on the calendar
step.expected: Both dates are now highlighted

case.title: Select one date > Verify the search button is enabled

custom.preconds: Calendar UI is open

step.content: Select one date
step.expected: Search is tappable Guest is set to one Checkout day defaults to one day after check-in date

step.content: Tap Search
step.expected: Search result screen displays search results for this selected date range and guest configuration

case.title: Select hotel stay longer than 28 days > Verify user is prompted with error message

custom.preconds: Calendar UI is open

step.content: Select hotel stay longer than 28 days
step.expected: Verify user is prompted with error message pop up: Title: "Search Error" Text: "We are sorry, but we are unable to search for hotel stays longer than 28 days" The button on the pop up is "OK"

step.content: I tap OK on the error message
step.expected: I return to the search form

case.title: Calendar chevrons should be visible

custom.preconds: Calendar UI open

step.content: Tap on calendar chevrons (try different devices and iOS version)
step.expected: Calendar month and chevrons should be visible (should not turn yellow)

case.title: User should not be able to select a date in the past

custom.preconds: Calendar UI should be open

step.content: Try to select a date in the past
step.expected: The dates in the past should be disabled

case.title: Change the dates on the calendar > Verify date range updates in search field

custom.preconds: Calendar UI should be open

step.content: Select a range of dates
step.expected: The range should be reflected in search field

step.content: Select a different range of dates
step.expected: The new date range updates in search field accordingly

case.title: Tap on guest icon > Verify guest picker UI opens and functions

custom.preconds: hotel search form is open.

step.content: I tap on the guest icon
step.expected: The Guest picker UI animates up from the bottom.

case.title: Tap on guest picker > Add adults > Verify max number of adults is 6

custom.preconds: Hotel search form is open User taps on guest picker icon

step.content: Tap "+" button 5 times to add six adults
step.expected: The "+" button should be disabled User shouldn't be able to add more than 6 adults Guest picker icon counter updates to 6 Search button is enabled

case.title: Tap on guest picker > Verify min number of adults is 1

custom.preconds: Hotel search form is open User taps on guest picker icon
custom.expected: The "-" button should be disabled when you have one adult selected Search button is enabled Guest picker icon counter shows 1

case.title: Tap on guest picker > Add children > Verify max number of children is 4

custom.preconds: Hotel search form is open User taps on guest picker icon Number of adults should be defaulted to one

step.content: Tap "+" button 4 times to child selector
step.expected: Maximum 4 number of children can be added and Age picker field for all 4 children is displayed. Make sure Search button is not enabled until all children age is selected. Make sure minimum 1 adult is present.

case.title: Tap on guest picker > Add child > Verify age must be selected for each child

custom.preconds: Hotel search form is open User taps on guest picker icon

step.content: Tap "+" to add one child
step.expected: Verify "select age" button appears Search button is disabled while the age is not selected

step.content: Tap on "Select age Child one" button
step.expected: Child age picker shows up User should be able to select the age for child

step.content: Tap "Done" button"
step.expected: Childs age button appears and reflects selected age Search button becomes enabled Guest picker icon counter updates to 2

case.title: Tap on guest picker > Verify child's age ranges from "Less than 1" to "17 years old"
Tap on guest picker > Add 3 adults + 3 Children > Verify max number of hotel guests is 6

custom.preconds: Hotel search form is open User taps on guest picker icon

step.content: Verify that maximum number of users can not exceed 6 with any combination of adults and children.
step.expected:
Make Sure User can
1. Select 1 adult + 4 children 2. Select 2 adult + 4 Children 3. Select 3 Adult + 3 children 4. Select 4 adult + 2 children

case.title: Hotel search results list screen > Verify all screen elements appear in navbar, list, footer

custom.preconds: User has tapped the Hotels LOB button from the launcher screen and completed a hotel search.
custom.steps: 1. User is defaulted to list mode
custom.expected: 1. Navbar contains from left to right: Expedia icon to back out to launcher Name of the destination the user searched in the center top line Calendar icon, date range the user searched for, guest icon and the number of guests the user searched for Magnifying glass search icon at right 2. Search result cells are displayed under the header 3. Footer contains from left to right: Map button POS pricing display approach text "Prices on average, per night" or "Total price for stay" Sort button

case.title: Hotel search results list screen > Verify 1st, 52nd, and 53rd hotels in list are sponsored listings regardless of what sort is used

custom.preconds: User has tapped the Hotels LOB button from the launcher screen and completed a hotel search.
custom.steps: 1. The list of hotels appears 2. The user scrolls down to the 52nd and 53rd cells in the list 3. The user changes the default sort of the list
custom.expected: 1. The first hotel cell in the list contains the text "Sponsored" in the bottom right corner 2. The 52nd and 53rd cells in the list contain the text "Sponsored" in the bottom right corner 3. The sponsored listings remain in the same 1st, 52nd, 53rd spots no matter what sort is applied.

case.title: Hotel search results list screen > Verify pricing display is correct for 'average per night' POS

custom.preconds: User is set to one of the following POS (US, Canada, Japan, Mexico, Brazil, Argentina, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Korea, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Taiwan, Vietnam, Singapore) and has tapped the Hotels LOB button from the launcher screen and completed a hotel search for a one night or a multi-night stay.
custom.steps: 1. User is defaulted to list mode
custom.expected: 2. Footer text displays "Prices average, per night"

case.title: Hotel search results list screen > Verify pricing display is correct for 'total per stay' POS

custom.preconds: User is set to one of the following POS (Austria, Belgium, Germany, Denmark, Spain, France, UK, Italy, Netherlands, Sweden, New Zealand, Australia) and has tapped the Hotels LOB button from the launcher screen and completed a hotel search for a one night or a multi-night stay.
custom.steps: 1. User is defaulted to list mode
custom.expected: 1. Footer text displays "Total price for stay"

case.title: Hotel search results list screen > Verify Filters menu is hidden under navbar until user scrolls up to access it

custom.preconds: User has tapped the Hotels LOB button from the launcher screen and completed a hotel search.
custom.steps: 1. User is defaulted to list mode 2. User scrolls the list up 3. User performs new search
custom.expected: 1. The filter is not visible in the default search results 2. Filter is now visible as the top row under the navbar and over the hotel cells 3. Filter is still visible

case.title: Hotel results page > Tap on Sort Button > Verify Sort By Popular

custom.preconds: Search for cities "San Francisco", "Chicago", "Las vegas", "New York", "los angeles" for future dates with default travelers. User goes to Hotel Results page.

step.content: tap on Sort button.
step.expected:
User gets Sort overlay with different Sort options. Sort By Popular should be selected by default.
It will show Sort by popular for only above mentioned cities in precondition.

case.title: Hotel results page > Tap on Sort Button >Verify Sort By price

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results page.

step.content: Tap on Sort button.
step.expected: User gets Sort overlay with different Sort options.

step.content: Select Sort By Price option
step.expected: Verify that the hotels are sorted by price in ascending order. Sponsored hotels will not be part of sort.

case.title: Hotel results page > Tap on Sort Button >Verify Sort By Discount

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results page.

step.content: Tap on Sort button.
step.expected: User gets Sort overlay with different Sort options.

step.content: Select Sort By Discount option
step.expected: Verify that all discounted hotels should show up on the top. FYI: they are not sorted by discount percentage. Sponsored hotels will not be part of sort.

case.title: Hotel results page > Tap on Sort Button >Verify Sort By Rating

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results page.

step.content: Tap on Sort button.
step.expected: User gets Sort overlay with different Sort options.

step.content: Select Sort By Ratings option
step.expected: Verify that the hotels are sorted by Ratings in descending order. Ratings number/Bar should appear in descending order. Sponsored hotels will not be part of sort.

case.title: Hotel results page > Tap on Sort Button >Verify Sort By Distance

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in Current location, POI (Statue of Liberty), Specific address, Airport code for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results page.

step.content: Tap on Sort button.
step.expected: User gets Sort overlay with different Sort options. For current location search Sort By Distance will be selected by default. For other cases when user selects Sort by distance hotels should be sorted by nearest to furthest.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Verify filter bar appears

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button "Hotel Name" placeholder should appear in the input field

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Verify filter by Hotel Name functionality

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now Type any hotel name that is present on the hotel results page.
step.expected: Hotel results should get filtered and only hotels with entered text or name should show up on the results page.

step.content: Now try to type random text "snkfhif9"
step.expected: And no results found message should show up.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify Hotel Filters screen appears

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify user can filter by Price

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

step.content: Now try to use the different Filter options in Price. For $ Filter -> Only Cheap hotels should show up For $$ filter -> Only medium price range hotels should show up. For $$$ filter -> Only expensive hotels should show up.
step.expected: User should see updated results and verify the filter is applied properly by checking the prices on hotel results page.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify user can filter by Distance

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in Current Location for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

step.content: Now try to use the different Filter options in filter by Distance.
step.expected: User should see updated results and verify the filter is applied properly by checking the distance for hotels on hotel results page.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify user can filter by Ratings

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

step.content: Now try to use the different Filter options in filter by ratings section.
step.expected: User should see updated results and verify the filter is applied properly to the hotel results by checking the ratings on hotel results page.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify user can filter by VIP Access

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

step.content: Now try to use the Vip access filter
step.expected: Verify the hotel results page shows hotels with Vip access only and they have a Vip access button on the gallery image.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify user can filter by mixing all filter options

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

step.content: Now try to use the different Filter combinations. Price + Ratings + distance + Vip Price + Ratings + distance Ratings + distance + Vip Price + Ratings distance + Vip
step.expected: Verify that the hotel results gets filtered with every combination and correctly.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Tap on Filters Button > Verify "No Matching Hotels" message

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap on the Filter button.
step.expected: verify Hotel Filters screen appears with filter by price, distance, ratings and VIP access options are present.

step.content: Now try to use the different Filter combinations. Use Vip Access filter + $ price .
step.expected: "No Matching Hotel" message shows up. And tapping on done and going to the Hotel results page shows "Sorry, no hotels match your current filter." error message.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Type Hotel name that does not exist > Verify no hotel match message

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers. User should be on hotel results screen.

step.content: Swipe down on search results screen
step.expected: Filter by "Hotel Name" bar should appear on top of search results along with Filters button

step.content: Now tap inside "Hotel name" Filter bar. And type random characters "jkh894n" or type a hotel name which is not present in the list.
step.expected: "Sorry, no hotels match your current filter." message should show up on hotel results page.

case.title: Hotel result page> Swipe down > Type Hotel name > Refresh search > Verify that all filter options go to default values
Hotel MRU list > Verify "Current Location" is at the top of the MRU list every time

custom.preconds: User has entered the Hotels LOB and the search form has opened. User has allowed Expedia Bookings location services.
custom.steps: 1. Clear private data or do a fresh install and launch and enter the Hotels LOB 2. Perform multiple searches
custom.expected: 1. Search form opens with the MRU list only containing "Current Location" (MRU list is underneath the date field) 2. "Current Location" always appears at the top of the MRU list

case.title: Hotel MRU list > Verify reverse geocoded location appears in the MRU list as the second entry under "Current Location"

custom.preconds: User has entered the Hotels LOB and the search form has opened. User has allowed Expedia Bookings location services

case.title: Hotel details page > Verify user can navigate via gallery by swiping left/right

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers Pick any hotel from search results User should be on hotel details screen

step.content: swipe right to left
step.expected: next image should load observe default image while server image is still loading

step.content: swipe left to right
step.expected: previous image should load observe default image while server image is still loading

case.title: Hotel details page > Verify default template image

custom.preconds: Search for "Visak Hotel, Kiev, UA" future date and default number of travelers User should land on hotel details screen

step.content: swipe right to left/left to right
step.expected: default template image should appear swipe gesture should be disabled

case.title: Hotel details page > Tap on image gallery > Verify that gallery transition to full screen mode

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers Pick any hotel from search results User should be on hotel details screen

step.content: tap on gallery image
step.expected: Gallery should expand into full screen mode

step.content: tap on gallery image again
step.expected: Gallery should collapse into details screen mode

case.title: Hotel details page > Swipe Up/Down on image gallery > Verify that gallery expands/collapses

custom.preconds: Search for hotels in any city for future date and default number of travelers Pick any hotel from search results User should be on hotel details screen

step.content: swipe down gallery image
step.expected: Gallery should expand into full screen mode

step.content: swipe right/left
step.expected: verify images transition in full screen mode

step.content: swipe up gallery image
step.expected: Gallery should collapse into details screen mode

section.name: Hotel guest details traveler info screen
Hotel checkout payment details payment info screen

case.title: Select random Hotel > Enter Carte Blanche > Verify Carte Blanche error message

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap Payment details
step.expected: Payment details screen appears

step.content: Enter "9500 0000 0000 0000" as a credit card number
step.expected: "This hotel does not accept Carte Blanche." error message appear

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with Fake Credit Card > Verify checkout error message

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Guest details" button
step.expected: Guest details screen slides from the right

step.content: Enter default/random guest details and click next
step.expected: Next button should be grayed out if some info is missing After tapping next Payment details screen slides from the right

step.content:
Enter Fake credit card number: "4123 4567 8901 2372" and other valid info: exp date = 08/18 zip code = 94114
Tap "Done button"
step.expected: User is taken back to checkout screen with "Slide to purchase" slider on the bottom of the screen

step.content: Slide the purchase bar from left to right
step.expected: User should be prompted to enter CVV code

step.content: Enter CVV code as 737 and tap "Done" button
step.expected: User is prompted with error message: "We’re sorry, but we were unable to process your payment. Please verify that you entered your information correctly."

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with Invalid Credit Card > Verify Expedia warning sign

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Guest details" button
step.expected: Guest details screen slides from the right

step.content: Enter default/random guest details and click next
step.expected: Next button should be grayed out if some info is missing After tapping next Payment details screen slides from the right

step.content:
Enter Invalid credit card number: "4999 9999 9999 9999" and other valid info: exp date = 08/18 zip code = 94114
Tap "Done button"
step.expected: User is prompted with Expedia warning sign

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with 14 digit Visa card> Verify Expedia warning sign

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Guest details" button
step.expected: Guest details screen slides from the right

step.content: Enter default/random guest details and click next
step.expected: Next button should be grayed out if some info is missing After tapping next Payment details screen slides from the right

step.content:
Enter 14 digit Visa credit card number: "4111 1111 1111 11" and other valid info: exp date = 08/18 zip code = 94114
Tap "Done button"
step.expected: User is prompted with Expedia warning sign

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with bad CVV code> Verify Checkout error message

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen Price of the hotel need to be more than $200.

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Guest details" button
step.expected: Guest details screen slides from the right

step.content: Enter default/random guest details and click next
step.expected: Next button should be grayed out if some info is missing After tapping next Payment details screen slides from the right

step.content:
Enter Valid credit card number: "4444 4444 4444 4448" and other valid info: exp date = 08/18 zip code = 94114
Tap "Done button"
step.expected: User is taken back to checkout screen with "Slide to purchase" slider on the bottom of the screen

step.content: Slide the purchase bar from left to right
step.expected: User should be prompted to enter CVV code

step.content: Enter BAD CVV code as 000 and tap "Done" button
step.expected: User is prompted with error message: "We’re sorry, but we were unable to process your payment. Please verify that you entered your information correctly."

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with invalid guest info > Verify error message

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Guest details" button
step.expected: Guest details screen slides from the right

step.content: a. Leave first name field blank (entering valid info in all other fields) b. Enter only one character (entering valid info in all other fields)
step.expected: Next button should be disabled

step.content: Leave last name field blank (entering valid info in all other fields)
step.expected: Next button should be disabled

step.content: a. Leave phone number field blank (entering valid info in all other fields) b. Enter invalid phone number (abd;:;)
step.expected: Next button should be disabled

step.content: 1.Leave e-mail filed blank (entering valid info in all other fields) 2. Wrong email format.
step.expected: Next button should be disabled

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with invalid payment info > Verify error message

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Payment details" button
step.expected: Payment details screen slides from the right

step.content: Try setting Credit Card expiration date to the date from the past
step.expected: User shouldn't be able to select past date as Credit Card expiration date

step.content: Try entering Credit Card number that is too short: 4111 1111 1111
step.expected: Done button should be disabled

case.title: Select random Hotel > Checkout with invalid guest e-mail > Verify error pop-up

custom.preconds: User has selected a hotel and room and is now on Checkout Screen

step.content: Tap Checkout button
step.expected: The screen scroll down to Guest details and Payment details

step.content: Tap "Guest details" button
step.expected: Guest details screen slides from the right

step.content: Enter e-mail that doesn't match e-mail pattern: a. abc@abc,com b. abc @abc.com c. aaa d. <email>
step.expected: user should see alert message with "Please enter a valid e-mail address." text Tapping "OK" on the alert should take user back to "Guest info" screen

section.name: Hotel Map Search
section.description: User switches from list mode to map mode in Search Results list, performs a new search and accesses details->checkout

section.name: Hotel Search from Car confirmation page - hotel attach
section.description: (non-US POS have hotel attach instead of air attach)

section.name: Hotel search from Flight confirmation page - hotel attach
section.description: (non-US POS have hotel attach instead of air attach)

section.name: Hotel search from Air Attach banner on confirmation page
Hotel search from Air Attach banner on Itinerary screen

case.title: Hotel Loyalty members > Gold member > TW POS

custom.preconds: Select Taiwan (TW) POS and Sign In into the Gold ACC. Please use: opd_rewards_gold@yahoo.com / test123 Must be tested in iPhone and iPad.

step.content: Open EB App and click on "Settings" (iPhone) or click on "i" (iPad).
step.expected: Info page will open.

step.content: Click on "Booking Support".
step.expected: Pop Up window will open. Make sure that you have Gold member phone # 02 8793 3042.

step.content: On the Launch screen click on the Hotels and Search for any hotel, any city, any days.
step.expected: Search Hotels page open.

step.content: Select any Hotel from the list and go to Checkout
step.expected: Checkout page will open and you should see a user Signed In and a Gold banner for Gold member.

step.content: Book ant Hotel and open "Your Trips". Expand any Itinerary card on Your Tips page.
step.expected: You should see a Gold member Phone #.

case.title: Hotel Loyalty members > Silver member > TW POS

custom.preconds: Select Taiwan (TW) POS and Sign In into the Silver ACC. Please use: opd_rewards_silver@yahoo.com / test123 Must be tested in iPhone and iPad.

step.content: Open EB App and click on "Settings" (iPhone) or click on "i" (iPad).
step.expected: Info page will open.

step.content: Click on "Booking Support".
step.expected: Pop Up window will open. Make sure that you have Silver member phone #

step.content: On the Launch screen click on the Hotels and Search for any hotel, any city, any days.
step.expected: Search Hotels page open.

step.content: Select any Hotel from the list and go to Checkout.
step.expected: Checkout page will open and you should see a user Signed In and a Gold banner for Gold member.

step.content: Book ant Hotel and open "Your Trips". Expand any Itinerary card on Your Tips page.
step.expected: You should see a Gold member Phone #.
